course_description: Learners examine key concepts of person-centered care and the impact experiences have on health and healthcare quality and safety outcomes. The main determinants of patient engagement and the challenges or opportunities for improvement will be explored.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5839, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: B. Robertson, Status: Closed
